content: If you roll a fair dice six times, which sequence is more likely: 111111 or 123456?

Both sequences are equally likely when rolling a fair die six times. Each roll is independent, and each face has an equal probability of landing face up. The probability of any specific sequence occurring is (1/6)^6, regardless of the numbers in the sequence. Therefore, the sequences 111111 and 123456 are equally probable.
